::DarkMouse::

"Oh"
She was still wasn't sure on the why part of her question. But at 
least she knew who.  She pulled the pelt back and looked at 
Quickstrike. "I'm sorry about what happened. I mean, I tried to 
defend the ship. I guess I didn't do a good job huh?"
She tried to sit up.  The pelt fell off to the side on the table.  
Her thin legs hung down. She had tiger stripe scars on her legs.  She 
put her hands on the edge of the table to support herself. She looked 
thin and her body showed a few scars from the battle.  She had a long 
scar going up her side, from her hip up to her shoulder blade. She 
looked up at Quickstrike. "Well, I won't make that mistake again. 
I'll kill them first and ask questions later."  Her arms were shaking 
as she leaned on them. She smiled. It was good to have control over 
her body again.  

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> "Ah wasn't the one that did this," Quickstrike replied to Dark 
> Mouse. "It was Black Arachnia."
